resources.string:
Each cell in a row, column, or box needs to be filled with a unique number from 1 to 9 and no cells can be duplicated.

 Attention:
 - Click the [img src=ic_reset/] icon to delete all the numbers you entered.
 - Click on the [img src=ic_hint/] icon to see hints.
 - Click the [img src=ic_solve/] icon to see the sample solution.
